TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueSource extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 报告从 返回的信息。

span.span: Reports the information returned from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数信息的传输中包含属性。Most of the information that transmits is contained in the property. 此属性包含一个枚举值，指定一个方面的整体[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]负责依赖项属性的有效值的属性系统。This property contains an enumeration value that specifies exactly one aspect of the overall [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system that is responsible for the effective value of a dependency property. 除了基本的值，可能需要关注有关依赖项属性值的其他信息是是否值进行动画处理，以及值是否涉及到 （如绑定或动态资源引用） 的表达式。Besides the base value, the other information that might be interesting about a dependency property value is whether the value is being animated, and whether the value involves an expression (such as a binding, or a dynamic resource reference). 报告此信息和分别。This information is reported by and respectively. 此外，如果属性值上执行强制，属性将保留所需的值，并尝试达到该预期的值，如果更改或提升的特定强制转换的约束属性值。Also, if coercion is acting on a property value, the property retains a desired value, and the property value will attempt to reach that desired value if the constraints of the specific coercion are changed or lifted. 强制转换后的属性不在其所需的值将报告是`true`。A coerced property that is not at its desired value will report that is `true`.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取 枚举的值，该值报告向依赖项属性系统提供值的源。

span.span: Gets a value of the enumeration, which reports the source that provided the dependency property system with a value.
A value of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对属性执行强制转换或动画，基本的值不是有效的值。The base value is not the effective value if either coercion or animation is acting on the property. 检查和如果你想要确定基本值是否为有效的值。Check and if you want to determine whether the base value is the effective value. 您可能还想要检查若要查看是否基础值计算出表达式。You might also want to check to see if the base value was evaluated out of an expression.

param.span: 与此 进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this .

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示此 是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果提供的对象与当前 相同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the provided object is equivalent to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持基于每个每个属性值的值相等性结构。This implementation supports value equality, based on each of the property values of each structure.

span.span: A 32-bit unsigned integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此哈希代码基于值。This hash code is based on the value.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值声明是否对属性进行动画处理。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the property is being animated.

value.span: 如果对该属性进行动画处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is animated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于当前进行动画处理的任何属性，源报告的没有立即关系，因为动画在依赖项属性优先级高于基础值进行操作。For any property that is currently being animated, the source reported by is not immediately relevant, because the animation operates at higher dependency property precedence than the base value. 有关优先级和动画的详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information about precedence and animations, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

public: property bool IsCoerced { bool get(); };
member this.IsCoerced : bool

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，声明此值是否是从应用于依赖属性的 实现中生成的。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from a implementation applied to a dependency property.

value.span: 如果此值是从应用于依赖项属性的 实现中生成的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value resulted from a implementation applied to a dependency property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性值上执行强制，属性将保留所需的值，并尝试达到该预期的值，如果更改或提升的特定强制转换的约束属性值。If coercion is acting on a property value, the property retains a desired value, and the property value will attempt to reach that desired value if the constraints of the specific coercion are changed or lifted. 强制转换后的属性不在其所需的值将报告是`true`。A coerced property that is not at its desired value will report that is `true`. 强制在优先级高于的基值的作用和不严格地说是如何设置基础值的参与者。Coercion acts at higher precedence than the base value, and is not strictly speaking a participant in how the base value is set. 此属性，而不是按值进行强制的状态报告因此枚举。Therefore the state of being coerced is reported by this property, rather than by a value of the enumeration. 有关强制转换、 基础值和优先级的详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information about coercion, base values, and precedence, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，声明此值是否是从计算的表达式中生成的。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from an evaluated expression.

summary.span: 此表达式可能是支持绑定的 ，或者是一个内部表达式，比如支持 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)的那些表达式。

span.span: This might be a supporting a binding, or an internal expression such as those that support the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

value.span: 如果值来自于计算出的表达式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value came from an evaluated expression; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算的表达式还会报告其中应用了表达式，作为中的值设置条件的特定基值。An evaluated expression will also report the specific base value setting condition where the expression was applied, as a value in . 仍是非常适用于任何属性，是`true`。The is still very relevant for any property where is `true`. 了解通过表达式是否一个值，可以设置值间接，例如通过模板或继承的属性值的情况特别有用。Knowing whether a value came through an expression can be particularly useful if the value was set indirectly, such as through a template or an inherited property value. 如果无法计算表达式 （的绑定失败; 未找到该名称的任何资源），则值将来自在属性系统中，最有可能某些其他参与者的默认值。If an expression fails to evaluate (the binding failed; no resource of that name was found), then the value will come from some other participant in the property system, most likely the default value. 在随后报告该源。That source is then reported in . 将返回失败的表达式计算`false`为。Failed expression evaluations will return `false` for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现会调用，返回其求反运算，并支持基于的所有属性的值相等性。This implementation calls , returning its negation, and supports value equality based on all properties of .
